commit message:
Fixed items time display.

Will only display time for items where the time has been set by the
user.

Adding reminder no longer opens calendar app

Event created in background.

Fixed previous commit where event alarm was not set

An event reminder is now set.

Items created when filter applied not always added

Items are now only displayed when they are created if they meet the
filter criteria.

Partial conversion from JDK date to Joda Time

Still need to handle the conversion of the time of day.

Basic saving and loading

Bug where the item is added under the wrong section when the app is
reloaded
Item completion saves + old items deleted
TextView's hidden if no checkbox in relevant layout
Reminder now set at user specified time

Started Checkbox menus

Begun work on 'Edit' menu option.
Context Menu for Checkboxes now works
Can no longer make two tasks with the same name
